empty_states.no_relationships_hint: Use edit mode to add relationships
empty_states.no_family_hint: Use edit mode to add family members
empty_states.need_more_characters_relationships_hint: Create at least 2 characters to establish friendships, rivalries, and other social connections
empty_states.need_more_characters_family_hint: Create at least 2 characters to define family relationships like parents, siblings, and relatives
empty_states.create_more_hint: Create more characters to establish relationships

empty_state.title: Only the main version exists
empty_state.description: Create alternative versions to explore different character states

hint.title: ðŸ’¡ Tip:
hint.description: Create versions to explore different character states: pre-transformation, injured version, alternate version, etc. Each version maintains independent data!

create_dialog.title: Create New Version
create_dialog.info_message: First, define the version name and description. Then you can customize the character data.
create_dialog.description_placeholder: Describe the differences of this version...

relationships.configure_relationship: Configure the relationship type and intensity
relationships.description_placeholder: Add a description about this relationship...
relationships.no_characters_available_hint: You have already related all available characters or there are no other characters created

relationship_types.friend_desc: Share moments of trust and camaraderie, supporting each other through challenges and celebrations
relationship_types.rival_desc: Constantly compete for similar goals, pushing each other through respectful or intense rivalry
relationship_types.mentor_desc: Guides, teaches and imparts knowledge and experience, shaping the development and growth of the other
relationship_types.apprentice_desc: Learns, follows teachings and seeks to absorb the wisdom and skills transmitted by the other
relationship_types.enemy_desc: Maintains active hostility and direct opposition, seeking to harm or prevent the other's objectives
relationship_types.love_interest_desc: Harbors romantic feelings and attraction, with potential to develop a loving relationship
relationship_types.ally_desc: Cooperates and works together towards common goals, maintaining a strategic or circumstantial partnership
relationship_types.acquaintance_desc: Has superficial mutual knowledge, without deep emotional bond or frequent interactions
relationship_types.leader_desc: Commands, guides and makes decisions that influence the actions and directions of the other
relationship_types.subordinate_desc: Follows orders, respects hierarchy and executes guidelines established by the other
relationship_types.family_love_desc: Shares deep affective bonds of family nature, with unconditional love and mutual protection
relationship_types.romantic_relationship_desc: Maintains an established loving relationship, with affective commitment and emotional intimacy
relationship_types.best_friend_desc: Has a deep and special friendship bond, being close confidants and inseparable companions
relationship_types.hatred_desc: Carries deep animosity and repulsion, actively wishing harm or suffering upon the other
relationship_types.neutral_desc: Has no significant feelings or relevant interactions, maintaining mutual indifference
relationship_types.devotion_desc: Dedicates absolute loyalty and unconditional admiration, placing the other's interests above their own

version.title: Delete Version
version.message: Are you sure you want to delete the version "{{versionName}}"?

character.title: Delete Character
character.message: Are you sure you want to delete "{{entityName}}"?
character.message_with_versions: This will permanently delete "{{entityName}}" and all {{totalVersions}} versions.

validation.name_max_length: Name must be at most 100 characters
validation.age_max_length: Age must be at most 50 characters
validation.description_max_length: Description must be at most 500 characters
validation.height_max_length: Height must be at most 50 characters
validation.weight_max_length: Weight must be at most 50 characters
validation.skin_tone_max_length: Skin tone must be at most 100 characters
validation.hair_max_length: Hair must be at most 100 characters
validation.eyes_max_length: Eyes must be at most 200 characters
validation.face_max_length: Face must be at most 200 characters
validation.distinguishing_features_max_length: Distinguishing features must be at most 400 characters
validation.personality_max_length: Personality must be at most 500 characters
validation.hobbies_max_length: Hobbies must be at most 500 characters
validation.dreams_and_goals_max_length: Dreams and goals must be at most 500 characters
validation.fears_and_traumas_max_length: Fears and traumas must be at most 500 characters
validation.favorite_food_max_length: Favorite food must be at most 100 characters
validation.favorite_music_max_length: Favorite music must be at most 100 characters
validation.past_max_length: Past must be at most 1000 characters
